Updated November     pm



The Greenville City Council met for the first time this year on Monday Jan PERIOD  at  p.m PERIOD

 said David Brown Greenville City engineer PERIOD

The meeting opened with a prayer followed by the Pledge of Allegiance PERIOD

The AdoptAStreet program was discussed during the meeting eight sections of streets throughout Greenville were adopted PERIOD ECU Greek organizations private ECU student groups and Greenville businesses contributed to the program PERIOD

Ulrich Alsentzer the chairman of Greenvilles environmental advisory commission spoke on behalf of the Environmental Initiatives Commission PERIOD Alsentzer proposed a tree ordinance plan advocating the preservation of mature canopy trees PERIOD

 said Alsentzer PERIOD

Alsentzer promoted his recycling program stating it 

Alsentzer also said it is imperative to reduce emission from school buses in order to reduce asthma in school children PERIOD He asserted his point by stating  Ariel Lopez chairperson of the Youth Council of Greenville is a junior at J.H PERIOD Rose High School in Greenville PERIOD Lopez spoke of the American homeless statistics the Youth Councils trip to Nevada and homeownership PERIOD

 Lopez said PERIOD

Among programs requesting to receive funds from the Governors Crime Commission grant was the McCloud computer skills and training center and the Boys and Girls Club PERIOD

While talking about supporting ECU to establish a school of dentistry Mildred A PERIOD Council mayor protem realized an opportunity for ECU students to reach out to those in need within the Greenville community PERIOD

 Council said PERIOD

The City Council members including the Mayor are all elected officials PERIOD The Mayor and City Council Members serve twoyear terms PERIOD Elections are held every other November in odd years and the elections are nonpartisan PERIOD Council meetings typically occur twice a month on Mondays and Wednesdays PERIOD

For more information about the Greenville City Council go to www.greenvillenc.gov PERIOD

This writer can be contacted at newstheeastcarolinian.com PERIOD
